resources.string: This services has a toggleable overlay which displays the text on your phone in a way tailored to your needs
Do you mix up letters that are similar in shape?
If you know the letters you mix up, please type them here.
Do you see some letters upside down?
If you know the letters you see upside down, please type them here.
Do you see text jump around the page?
Do you see the letters bunched together?
Do your eyes skip lines when you read?
Do you often find the text size too small?
Penguins eat krill, fish, squid, and other small animals from the ocean, which they catch. They are at home in the ocean. They come up on the land or ice to lay their eggs and raise the chicks.
